application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of enhanced sound insulation value of at least 5dB above the maximum Building Regulations value for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/uses, namely, bedroom adjoining the communal entrance pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref: 223972FUL dated 23/02/2023 for: Conversion of dwellinghouse into three self-contained units with associated bin storage, bicycle parking and private amenity space; first floor rear extension; alteration to external side elevations involving installation of two windows; alteration to front of property involving hard and soft landscaping (Part-Retrospective Application)
